comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
This picture was taken in calle Ignacio Rayón (formerly San Pedro Street), from foreground to background, people and donkeys are by calle Niños Héroes, from left to right.
To the right in front of the window today is Plaza de los Niños Heroes.
There's a  William Henry Jackson's photo, Detroit Publishing Company collection, The Library of Congress, taken on the same street, closer to the aqueduct, that also appears printed on The Morning Standard, issue of November 27, 1910, The Library of Congress, Cronicling America.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
Plastic Surgeon
